targets.query:
from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["domain"])
  |> yield(name: "{{domain}}")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] != "" and r["domain"] != "" and r["state"] != "")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r._value / 1000.0) * 100}))
  |> yield(name: "Reliability %")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "mqtt")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "MQTT Events")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "websocket")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "WebSocket Events")
